name: Electric Vehicle Charging
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non–face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell electric vehicle charging services. If the
merchant’s primary business is temporary parking services, MCC
7523 may be used instead.
For merchants that sell electric vehicle charging equipment designed
for personal use, use MCC 5533.
For merchants that sell electric vehicle charging equipment designed
for commercial use, use MCC 5013.
For merchants that sell automotive gasoline, use MCC 5541 for sales
occurring in a service station and MCC 5542 for sales occurring at an
automated fuel dispenser.
